extendedInfo.description: this application is a simple touch game.it will help you to check your reaction time.when you start game, you can see a colored star at right upper and can see four of colored stars on center of screen.among four of colored stars on the screen, you should touch a star same as right upper star.when you start the game, timer's time also increase.if you touch 20 times correctly game is finished and you can post your score to rank server.let's do this game with friend.let's try reduce your reaction time.#keywordReaction time test, quick-touch, funny games, time bets, ranking the server game, quickly press and competitive games.

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: Game crashes, vibration is off putting and waists battery unnecessarily.
reviews.author: Mike Method

reviews.title: Nice ui
reviews.comment: Good looking but but bad for color blind people
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I would like to see the best and worse scores at least. Kinda fun for a bit.
reviews.author: Stephen Ray

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: But you should add on with like same colored shapes that have diff figures  and maybe add in numbers. If that makes sense
reviews.author: A Google User
